1. If a samurai was to lose a battle, and return alive, would he commit 
suicide?
Why should he? That only happens in movies.

2. Were there any female samurai?
Yeah and they were really hot looking but they usually had a bad case of 
PMS. They had names like Hot Susuki or Kamon Iwannalaya

3. What would happen if a samurai's katana was stolen?
He would head over to the nearest pawnshop to pick up a replacement or just 
go ahead and carve a big wooden club and add some nails to it. Otherwise, he 
would just use his bare hands. Come on, you've never seen a Japanese martial 
arts film?

4. If a samurai used seppuku to regain his honor, what would happen to his 
family?
Seppuku was just a way to escape facing failure like the grade you're going 
to get because you can't do your own research.
